description:
He has fantasized about having his own personal maid for what seemed to be a lifetime. But He lives in a single room apartment in the big city. His meager means provide him no chances in life. So his dream ends as fantasy. But, you never know what will happen in life.

One day, a voluptuous maid appeared in front of him. She was a childhood friend, and she was looking hotter then ever. Years ago, he told her of how he fantasized about the companionship of a maid, and she believed his words. Now, she would come back as a gorgeous maid, and reveals her life long lust for him. Accepting her wishes to become his, he would begin his dream life. Now his days and nights are wilder then he could have ever imagined. He had no idea what a dirty girl she had become.
title: Maid In Heaven Volume I
